name: Bridge Race Master
description:
Crossing the River is based on the very famous traditional and puzzle game. The challenges in the River Crossing game are also more diversified, testing your IQ. Includes various conundrums about how to get characters like the farmer, the tiger, the sheep, the carrot, the king or the queen... to move from one side of the river to the other and meet the game conditions.

Let's download and test yourself with this IQ game!!!
publishers: XGAME SERVICE AND TECHNOLOGY JOINT STOCK COMPANY
